paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variant rs7789146, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We focused on the KCNH2 promoter, for which the study identified an enhancer with a nearby risk variant (rs7789146) linked to atrial fibrillation.

functional_data.summary: The role of this variant on enhancer function was validated via CRISPR-Cas9 genome editing.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the context of atrial fibrillation.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was linked to atrial fibrillation and validated through functional assays.
key_quotes: We focused on the KCNH2 promoter, for which the study identified an enhancer with a nearby risk variant (rs7789146) linked to atrial fibrillation.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly mentioned with sufficient details.
